pages.text: $(li)The Honey Pot is a placeable block that can be used to store honey.$(br)$(li)Just right click on it while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/honey_bottle)Honey Bottle$(/l).
$(li)If a $(l:patchouli:villagers/villager)Villager$(/l) is located near a Honey Pot, it will turn into an $(l:patchouli:villagers/apiarist)Apiarist$(/l).
